Offline.description: HostManager ethernet switch offline devices count.

Online.description: HostManager ethernet switch online devices count.

Total.description: HostManager ethernet switch total devices count.

Status.possible_values:
- "Active" (service is enabled and running).
- "Disabled" (service is disabled).
- "Error" (service is enabled but not running due to some error such as invalid configuration)

SERVICES_LOCAL_HOSTMANAGER_ENABLED.description: Raised when an existing HostManager is enabled. This does not necessarily result from a configuration change of the administrative state field, but rather when it becomes operationally active.

SERVICES_LOCAL_HOSTMANAGER_DISABLED.description: Raised when an existing HostManager is disabled. This does not necessarily result from a configuration change of the administrative state field, but rather when it becomes operationally inactive or fails to start.

SERVICES_LOCAL_HOSTMANAGER_MODIFIED.description: Raised when an existing HostManager is modified. Updating the administrative state should also result in the event being triggered.

application/json.example: {"HostId": "Services.Local.HostManager.Hosts.{HostId}"}

SERVICES_LOCAL_HOSTMANAGER_HOST_ADDED.description: Raised when a new HostManager Host is added.

application/json.example: {"HostId": "Services.Local.HostManager.Hosts.{HostId}"}

SERVICES_LOCAL_HOSTMANAGER_HOST_DELETED.description: Raised when an existing HostManager Host is deleted.

application/json.example: {"HostId": "Services.Local.HostManager.Hosts.{HostId}"}

SERVICES_LOCAL_HOSTMANAGER_HOST_MODIFIED.description: Raised when an existing HostManager Host is modified. Updating the administrative state should also result in the event being triggered.
